title: Hamlet studies in interpretation
creator_credit: Richard Callanan and British Broadcasting Corporation
brief_description: This film shows two scenes from Hamlet, the Ophelia-Hamlet scene and the closet scene. The film demonstrates how different interpretation of the scenes by directors and actors may alter the impressions conveyed to the audience. Scenes are performed by Elizabeth Spriggs and Tom Chadbon.
